regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re, requests, xbmc, xbmcaddon, xbmcgui, time import urllib.parse def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#vbprofi query = str(showKeyBoard()) print( "xFehler: " + query) #suche = solver.get() search = urllib.parse.quote_plus(query) url = 'https://sterktv1.net/?s=' + search #source = requests.get(url, headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0', 'referer':url, 'accept':'*/*'},verify=False).text.replace('\/', '/') source = requests.get(url, headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0', 'referer':url}, verify=True).text #.replace('\/', '/') strurl = re.findall('

(.*?)

', source) #return ('%s|user-agent=ipad&origin=' + url + '&referer=' + url % strurl) return strurl ''' #class# class InputWindow(xbmcgui.WindowDialog): def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs): self.txt = kwargs.get('txt','') xbmcgui.WindowXMLDialog.__init__(self) #self.addControl(self.txt) #path = xbmcaddon.Addon().getAddonInfo('path') self.kbd = xbmc.Keyboard() self.kbd.setHeading( self.txt) def get(self): self.show() time.sleep(2) self.kbd.doModal() if (self.kbd.isConfirmed()): text = self.kbd.getText() self.close() return text self.close() return 'taybet' ''' #suchen def showKeyBoard(sDefaultText=""): # Create the keyboard object and display it modal oKeyboard = xbmc.Keyboard(sDefaultText) oKeyboard.doModal() # If key board is confirmed and there was text entered return the text if oKeyboard.isConfirmed(): sSearchText = oKeyboard.getText() if len(sSearchText) > 0: return sSearchText return False

regex.name: play
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re, requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): #url = 'https://medyahaber.info/category/ozel-program/' url = '[makelist.param1]' #source = requests.get(url, headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0', 'referer':url, 'accept':'*/*'},verify=False).text.replace('\/', '/') source = requests.get(url, headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0', 'referer':url}, verify=True).text #.replace('\/', '/') strurl = re.findall('<source src="(.*?\.mp4)"', source)[0] if 'http' not in strurl: strurl = 'https://sterktv1.net' + strurl #return ('%s|user-agent=ipad&origin=' + url + '&referer=' + url % strurl) return strurl

regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re, requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): #url = 'https://medyahaber.info/category/ozel-program/' url = '[makelist.param1]' #source = requests.get(url, headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0', 'referer':url, 'accept':'*/*'},verify=False).text.replace('\/', '/') source = requests.get(url, headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0', 'referer':url}, verify=True).text #.replace('\/', '/') strurl = 'https://sterktv1.net' + re.findall('<source src="(.*?\.mp4)"', source)[0] #return ('%s|user-agent=ipad&origin=' + url + '&referer=' + url % strurl) return strurl

regex.name: play
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re, requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): #url = 'https://medyahaber.info/category/ozel-program/' url = '[makelist.param1]' #source = requests.get(url, headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0', 'referer':url, 'accept':'*/*'},verify=False).text.replace('\/', '/') source = requests.get(url, headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0', 'referer':url}, verify=True).text.replace('\/', '/') strurl = re.findall('(https:.*?.mp4)\&', source)[0] #return ('%s|user-agent=ipad&origin=' + url + '&referer=' + url % strurl) return strurl
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:61.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/61.0

regex.name: zahl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#vbprofi # max = re.findall('(.*?)', re.findall('pagination pagination-centered(?s)(.*?)', page_data)[0])[0] max = re.findall('(.*?).*? .*? .*? .*?\»', re.findall('pagination pagination-centered(?s)(.*?)back-top', page_data)[0])[0] liste = "" for i in xrange(1, int(max)+1): liste += "'" + str(i) + "'" # liste = """'1''2''3'""" #list(range(17)) return liste

regex.name: multipage
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): myheaders = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 9_2 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/601.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) CriOS/47.0.2526.70 Mobile/13C71 Safari/601.1.46', 'Referer': 'http://gerilatv.com/'} # max = re.findall('(.*?)', re.findall('pagination pagination-centered(?s)(.*?)', page_data)[0])[0] # max = re.findall('(.*?).*? .*? .*? .*?\»', re.findall('pagination pagination-centered(?s)(.*?)', page_data)[0])[0] max = re.findall('(.*?).*? .*? .*? .*?\»', re.findall('pagination pagination-centered(?s)(.*?)back-top', page_data)[0])[0] liste = "" for i in xrange(1, int(max)+1): liste += requests.get('http://gerilatv.com//newvideos.php?page=' + str(i), headers= myheaders).text #codepage1 = requests.get('http://gerilatv.com//newvideos.php', headers= myheaders).text # code = codepage1 return liste
